mapper.insert: insert into memo_tb values (0, #{question}, #{answer}, default, #{explainMemo}, now(), now())
mapper.update: update memo_tb set question = #{question}, answer = #{answer}, explainMemo = #{explainMemo}, updateDate = now() where memoId = 1;
mapper.select: select memoId, question, answer, explainMemo, registerDate, updateDate from memo_tb where memoId = #{memoId}
select memoId, question, answer, explainMemo, registerDate, updateDate from memo_tb
select question, answer, explainMemo from memo_tb order by rand() limit 1
select memoId, question, answer, explainMemo, registerDate, updateDate from memo_tb where question like concat("%", #{all}, "%") or answer like concat("%", #{all}, "%")
select memoId, question, answer, explainMemo, registerDate, updateDate from memo_tb where question like concat("%", #{question}, "%")
select memoId, question, answer, explainMemo, registerDate, updateDate from memo_tb where answer like concat("%", #{answer}, "%")
